title: Wedding Vow Of Revenge
description: The instant Angelo Gordon sees stunning model Tara Peters, he’s certain she will share his bed. But her innocent beauty isn’t the only thing that attracts him--he’s out for revenge. . . Tara is not an easy conquest. When she pushes Angelo away, he realizes the only way he can have her is if he plays a very different game. And Angelo is happy to up the stakes – he’ll take the ultimate revenge--marriage!
author: Lucy Monroe
